title: Make grasp of the undying better.
body:
Grasp needs to be improved IMO. I'm just not sure how yet. Maybe change it from 4% of your max health on melee auto attacks to 4% of your max health plus 1 for every stack? So if you procced it 50 times. You'd do 4% max health plus 50 magic damage? 

For ranged it would be 2.4% plus .6 for every stack.

replies.body:
change the heal from 2% max health to 4% missing health. makes it stronger below 50% hp.

or make it possible to hold the keystone longer past a certain amount of stacks, like dark harvest used to work.
Just change the way it proc like every 4 damage instance against a enemy champion your next basic attack deal additional damage and heal you.
If grasp gets buffed hard then both tanks and bruisers would use it, leaving us with the same problem from before. Grasp is fine on tanks, just bruisers need their own equally balanced keystone.

It would just be a small damage buff. And it's not a significant amount. The most procs I've ever got in a game were in the 60 range on {{champion:51}}. So if the changes happened, that's like 40 magic damage after a 15 minute lane. You'd still be better off going conqueror or yellow tree runes unless you were an assassin.
